component.name: fheroes2
component.summary: fheroes2 is a recreation of the Heroes of Might and Magic II game engine

description.p: This open source multiplatform project, written from scratch, is designed to reproduce the original game with significant improvements to the gameplay, graphics and logic (including support for high-resolution graphics, improved AI, numerous fixes and UI improvements), breathing new life into one of the most addictive turn-based strategy games.
